meanings.definition: Interrupted the normal course or unity of
meanings.sent1: The loud noise disrupted the peaceful atmosphere.
meanings.sent2: The storm disrupted the outdoor event.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel disrupted the picnic by stealing all the snacks.
meanings.sent4: The unexpected power outage disrupted the flow of the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The barking dog disrupted my concentration while studying.

meanings.sent1: The protest disrupted the traffic in the city.
meanings.sent2: The strike disrupted the production schedule.
meanings.sent3: The playful puppy disrupted the orderly arrangement of shoes.
meanings.sent4: The leaked memo disrupted the harmony among coworkers.
meanings.sent5: The spilled paint disrupted the neatness of the room.
